title: People Schema
description: A schema to add individuals in the regenerative economy to the Murmurations Index

name.title: Full Name
name.description: The full name of the person

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the person (e.g., alice.net or some-host.net/alice)

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Keywords that describe the person, searchable in the Murmurations index

description.title: Description/Bio
description.description: A short description or biography of the person

image.title: Photo/Avatar
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://), preferably a square

images.title: Other Images
images.description: Other images (starting with https:// or http://) for this person

knows_language.title: Languages Spoken
knows_language.description: The languages a person can read, write and speak

contact_details.title: Contact Details
contact_details.description: The person's contact details (fill in at least one)

contact_form.title: Contact Form
contact_form.description: A webpage (starting with https:// or http://) with a contact form that can be used to reach the person

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: A list of relationships between this person (subject) and various other entities (objects)

predicate.title: Predicate
predicate.description: The predicate of the relationship (e.g. 'is a member of ___', 'has a selection of ___', 'knows ___ for 10 years', 'trust ___ to hold a copy of my keys', etc.)

object_url.title: Object URL
object_url.description: The URL (ideally the Primary URL) of the object of this relationship (must start with http:// or https://, e.g., https://alice.net)

schema.name: people_schema-v0.1.0
schema.purpose: To map people within the regenerative economy
